summary: Before the dawn of man, the lands were ruled by an ancient race of beings, taller than a mammoth and twice as aggressive. these beings of old are colossal in size and pack a mighty wallop, as sson as the dragons have come to life these old creatures were disturbed from their millennia slumber.
descriptionHtml:
found south of ivarstead in the woods and mountains there lies an old race of beings that seek to protect their old lands, they are known as the ancient guardians.

colossal in size and vicious as a sabrecat they guard their lands of old.

they are found around ivarstead woods in the south, the mountain pass to the east of the throat of the world and through whiterun tundra to labrynthian, two types of colossous are in this mod one is skeletal "colossus" and the other is the forgotten "draghr"

i made this for myself as a mess around and so far it is really fun especially with mods that alter lighting like Climates of tamriel (plus mintys lightning patch) and darker nights. i know the gold on them is a little much but im open for suggestions to where to go next with this :)

additional: screenshots would be helpful from players and feedback .

enjoy :)
author: umknown357
